thread.title: ONELAN Extends its Global ReachTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: ONELAN Extends its Global ReachTravelandtourworld.com
text:
ONELAN Extends its Global Reach
ONELAN has further consolidated its global presence by partnering with Veracomp as a new distributor in Poland. Veracomp is one of the largest IT distributors in Poland with headquarters located in Krakow. Veracomp also has a well-developed network of trade offices situated in the largest Polish cities. Established in 1991, it has grown into a group of IT companies operating in 16 countries in Central and Eastern Europe.
‘We’re really looking forward to working with the digital signage team at Veracomp and its partners introducing our latest media players and Reserva room signage solutions’ says Justin Peyton, ONELAN EMEA. ‘We are looking forward to introducing ONELAN to our customers’ says Dawid Manuszak, Product Manager at Veracomp. ‘ONELAN’s range of products complements our expansion in digital signage business and we are looking forward to replicate its previous success in Western Europe.’
ONELAN is a global leader for digital signage and IPTV solutions. Headquartered in the UK, with sales and support offices in Germany, USA and China, the company has over 300 partners in 50 countries. With a solid foundation and long history of profitable growth the business has received numerous awards since its foundation in 2000. The company develops innovative solutions for all types of screen-based communications including retail, DOOH, corporate communications and hospitality.
Source:-ONELAN
